strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3>
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3> + <Cap><string_4>
<se_def>*: I came to look at the waterfall and I stumbled upon this cave!

<se_def>*: A waterfall cave... It's so intriguing!
I was trying to explore, but I've gone and got myself completely lost!
<se_def>*: And don't get me started on that brute of a monster blocking the path up ahead!
<se_def>*: If you're thinking of going any distance into the cave, then take my advice and get your fighting skills up to a decent level first.
<se_high>*: Well, well! You must be really brave to come up and talk to me like this!
<se_high>*: A man that looked like a peddler came along earlier, but when he saw me, he ran away without saying a word!
<se_high>*: Anyway... As you've probably realised, you'll have to fight me if you want to go any further!

<se_high>*: What do you think?
Brave enough for that, are you!?
<se_high>*: I thought as much!
<se_high>*: Then you'd better be on your way.
<se_high>*: Hm? What do you want now? Have you changed your mind about fighting me?

<se_high>*: R-Really!? Y-You are brave.
That means you must be a good fighter...

<se_high>*: I know! In recognition of your bravery,
I'm going to let you through!

<se_high>*: Off you go.
Be careful now!
<se_high>*: Do you, by any chance, think I'm a bit of a wimp? Well, I'm not, I tell you!
<se_high>*: If you don't believe me, why don't you try your luck and fight me!?
<se_high>*: I thought as much!
<se_high>*: Then you'd better be on your way.
<se_high>*: R-Really...!?

<se_high>*: Th-Then I suppose it's decided.
Let's fight!
<se_high>*: Y-You caught me off guard. Uuurgh...

<se_high>*: But I suppose you won fair and square.
Go on, you can pass.

<se_high>*: Ha ha ha! You again!
You know how strong I am now, right?

<se_high>*: So what's the verdict?
Do you want a rematch!?

<se_high>*: (Slurp!) Guess what!?
This passage is a dead end!
<se_high>*: Do you believe me?
<se_high>*: Yay! Then I'll tell you something good!
<se_high>*: It is a dead end, but there's a treasure chest up there! (Slurp)

<se_high>*: Why not!? That's so mean!
Now I feel blue!
<se_high>*: You don't? Then there's no point in me telling you anything! Have a nice adventure. Bye bye!
<se_high>*: I'm so happy! You believe me!

<se_high>*: Just forget it.
I didn't really expect you to believe me anyway. (Slurp)

<se_high>*: Wow! You got the treasure? Was it any good?
I've been wondering what was inside that chest for ages!
